segments.source_content: {aisSocket} is the easiest way to control devices around your house. {aizWifiImg} This smart plug runs on free and open-source software. Now you can choose from over {moreWiFiDevices} devices which you can connect to the gate in the same simple way as our Smart Plug.

segments.source_content: We automate your home by combining the advantages of local control

metadata.json_description: Announcement line one
Announcement line two

segments.source_content: We integrate the world of cool and intelligent things that you can control and automate. A world where you can be independent and also be a part of community-based open projects with so many possibilities and tutorials. And we want this world to be available and more accessible to everyone.

metadata.json_description: Announcement line three

segments.source_content: Many intelligent solutions. A great fit for everyone!

metadata.json_description: One gate to rule them all text

segments.source_content: Project created and sponsored by people - thank you!

Join button line 4
Join button line 1
Join button line 2
Join button line 3
Zigbee number devices title

segments.source_content: With {aisZigbee} you can easily attach Zigbee devices to the gateway. {aizZigbeeConnbee2Img} More than {moreZigbeeDevices} devices are supported by the Zigbee2Mqtt software which we provide on our gateway.

metadata.json_description: Zigbee number devices description

segments.source_content: With {aisZwave} you can easily attach Zwave devices to the gateway. {aizZigbeeConnbee2Img}  You can use all Zwave devices supported by the ZwaveJs2Mqtt software which we provide on the gateway.

metadata.json_description: Zwave in AIS description
HA number of integrations title

segments.source_content: One of the components of the software delivered on the gateway is the AIS home automation platform. AIS is a fork of {aisHomeAssistant}. {aisHomeAssistantImg} With preinstalled and ready-to-use {aisHomeAssistantIntegrations} integrations and the possibility of adding more than {moreHomeAssistantMoreIntegrations} that are supported and developed by the Home Assistant community.

metadata.json_description: HA number of integrations description
Voice commands in AIS title

segments.source_content: We provide {aisVoiceCommands} Speech-to-text and text-to-speech, together with built-in commands, so you can control devices using voice commands. . {aisTtsSttImg} Commands can be sent from the {aisVoiceCommandsWeb} browser application, the {aisVoiceCommandsMob} mobile application or the {aisVoiceCommandsRemote} remote control. You can also send commands from other systems / applications using {aisVoiceCommandsApi} or even define your own {aisVoiceCommandsCreate} commands.

metadata.json_description: Voice commands in AIS description

segments.source_content: We provide a built-in {aisAudioPlayer} on the gateway which allows you to choose from hundreds of radio stations, podcasts, free audiobooks and free content from {aisAudioYouTube} and {aisAudioSpotify}.  {aisAudioImg} It is also possible to define your own additional audio content in {aisAudioPortal}.

metadata.json_description: Audio in AIS description

Voice commands in AIS title

segments.source_content: Source code for most of the components of our system are free and available in the repository {aisGithub}.

metadata.json_description: OpenSource in AIS description

segments.source_content: {aizOpenSourceImg} We believe in openness and freedom of choice. Thanks to this, you can use our design and build your own smart speaker {aisDevKit1}.

metadata.json_description: OpenSource in AIS description2
Free services title
Pro services title

The ARIA label for documentation menu

segments.source_content: We offer AIoT gateways in the AIS PRO product line where it is possible to purchase services with commercial servers and a guarantee of operation. {aisProImg}

metadata.json_description: Services number devices description

segments.source_content: Our cloud services on DEV gateways are hosted by the organization {aisFosshost}. {aisFosshostImg} Fosshost is a non-profit organization focused on supporting OpenSource projects.

metadata.json_description: Services number devices description

segments.source_content: We are open for proposals of using our AIS gateway in commercial products. You can contact us here info@ai-speaker.com in order to establish the terms of cooperation.

metadata.json_description: Services number devices description

segments.source_content: Find out more about free AIS services {aisFosshostFree}

metadata.json_description: Services number devices description
Tunnel services title

segments.source_content: Encrypted remote gateway access from the Internet.

metadata.json_description: Tunnel services description

segments.source_content: Both our cloud services and the gateway tunnel are protected against direct attacks by {aisCloudFlare} services. Your gateway is secure no matter how you access it: from your local network, from a mobile app, or from the Internet.

metadata.json_description: Tunnel services description2
AIS DEV3 Controller title

segments.source_content: AIS DEV3 controller operate on {soc}, have a built-in disk, as well as LAN/Ethernet, USB and HDMI ports. Has a Home Assistant platform installed.

metadata.json_description: Automation Controllers description
Automation Controllers soc
PRO Controller

segments.source_content: AIS PRO1 operates on an efficient {soc} system, has built-in WiFi and disk, as well as LAN/Ethernet, USB, SPDIF, Aux, HDMI ports. Has a Home Assistant platform installed.

metadata.json_description: Amlogic SoC s922x-H
Amlogic SoC s922x-H
AIS Adapter 1 title

segments.source_content: Zigbee 3.0 Adapter {info} zigbee devices (all online at the same time), has a range of 200 meters and works in a LAN! It is compatible with the Zigbee Home Automation and Zigbee2mqtt.

homepage.ais_announcement_line_one.message: We automate your home by combining the advantages of local control

homepage.ais_announcement_line_three.message: We integrate the world of cool and intelligent things that you can control and automate. A world where you can be independent and also be a part of community-based open projects with so many possibilities and tutorials. And we want this world to be available and more accessible to everyone.

homepage.ais_one_gate_for_all_text.message: Many intelligent solutions. A great fit for everyone!
homepage.ais_one_gate_for_all_text.description: One gate to rule them all text

homepage.ais_project_people_info.message: Project created and sponsored by people - thank you!

homepage.ais_features.zigbee.description.message: With {aisZigbee} you can easily attach Zigbee devices to the gateway. {aizZigbeeConnbee2Img} More than {moreZigbeeDevices} devices are supported by the Zigbee2Mqtt software which we provide on our gateway.

homepage.ais_features.zwave.description.message: With {aisZwave} you can easily attach Zwave devices to the gateway. {aizZigbeeConnbee2Img}  You can use all Zwave devices supported by the ZwaveJs2Mqtt software which we provide on the gateway.

homepage.ais_features.ha.description.message: One of the components of the software delivered on the gateway is the AIS home automation platform. AIS is a fork of {aisHomeAssistant}. {aisHomeAssistantImg} With preinstalled and ready-to-use {aisHomeAssistantIntegrations} integrations and the possibility of adding more than {moreHomeAssistantMoreIntegrations} that are supported and developed by the Home Assistant community.

homepage.ais_features.voice.description.message: We provide {aisVoiceCommands} Speech-to-text and text-to-speech, together with built-in commands, so you can control devices using voice commands. . {aisTtsSttImg} Commands can be sent from the {aisVoiceCommandsWeb} browser application, the {aisVoiceCommandsMob} mobile application or the {aisVoiceCommandsRemote} remote control. You can also send commands from other systems / applications using {aisVoiceCommandsApi} or even define your own {aisVoiceCommandsCreate} commands.

homepage.ais_features.audio.description.message: We provide a built-in {aisAudioPlayer} on the gateway which allows you to choose from hundreds of radio stations, podcasts, free audiobooks and free content from {aisAudioYouTube} and {aisAudioSpotify}.  {aisAudioImg} It is also possible to define your own additional audio content in {aisAudioPortal}.

homepage.ais_features.open.description.message: Source code for most of the components of our system are free and available in the repository {aisGithub}.

homepage.ais_features.open.description1.message: {aizOpenSourceImg} We believe in openness and freedom of choice. Thanks to this, you can use our design and build your own smart speaker {aisDevKit1}.

theme.blog.sidebar.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for recent posts in the blog sidebar

theme.docs.sidebar.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for documentation menu

homepage.ais_features.pro_services.descr.message: We offer AIoT gateways in the AIS PRO product line where it is possible to purchase services with commercial servers and a guarantee of operation. {aisProImg}

homepage.ais_features.services.descripti.message: Our cloud services on DEV gateways are hosted by the organization {aisFosshost}. {aisFosshostImg} Fosshost is a non-profit organization focused on supporting OpenSource projects.

homepage.ais_features.pro_services.descr.message: We are open for proposals of using our AIS gateway in commercial products. You can contact us here info@ai-speaker.com in order to establish the terms of cooperation.

homepage.ais_features.services.descripti.message: Find out more about free AIS services {aisFosshostFree}

homepage.ais_features.tunnel_service.des.message: Encrypted remote gateway access from the Internet.

Both our cloud services and the gateway tunnel are protected against direct attacks by {aisCloudFlare} services. Your gateway is secure no matter how you access it: from your local network, from a mobile app, or from the Internet.

home.featureList.dev3.description.message: AIS DEV3 controller operate on {soc}, have a built-in disk, as well as LAN/Ethernet, USB and HDMI ports. Has a Home Assistant platform installed.

home.featureList.pro1.description.message: AIS PRO1 operates on an efficient {soc} system, has built-in WiFi and disk, as well as LAN/Ethernet, USB, SPDIF, Aux, HDMI ports. Has a Home Assistant platform installed.

home.featureList.adapter1.description.message: Zigbee 3.0 Adapter {info} zigbee devices (all online at the same time), has a range of 200 meters and works in a LAN! It is compatible with the Zigbee Home Automation and Zigbee2mqtt.
